strings.SS2_ITEM_BABYTOYS_DESC: Lose up to <style=cIsUtility>{0} <style=cStack>(+{0} per stack)</style> levels</style> while <style=cIsUtility>retaining all stats</style>.

strings.SS2_ITEM_BABYTOYS_LORE:
Order: Baby's Toys
Tracking Number: 013*****
Estimated Delivery: 06/07/2056
Shipping Method:  High Priority
Shipping Address: 431, Golden Shore, Earth
Shipping Details:

Hey sweetheart! I'm sorry I couldn't go, but please, please take these for your baby. He's so little, but one day he could be the next big UES captain, who knows! I really want to see you two as soon as possible, things have been rough over here since I got ill and I don't want to put your baby in danger. Love you, please, PLEASE take care!
strings.SS2_ITEM_COMPOSITEINJECTOR_DESC: Gain <style=cIsDamage>1 <style=cStack>(+1 per stack)</style> extra equipment slots</style>. Trigger all of your equipment simultanesouly.
strings.SS2_ITEM_DROIDHEAD_DESC: Killing an elite enemy spawns a <style=cIsDamage>Security Drone</style> <style=cStack>(+{0}% base damage per stack)</style> for <style=cIsDamage>{1}s</style> <style=cStack>(+{2}s per stack)</style>. Spawned drones <style=cIsUtility>inherit the elite type</style> of the slain elite.
strings.SS2_ITEM_DROIDHEAD_PICKUP: Spawn a temporary drone upon killing an elite enemy.
strings.SS2_ITEM_DROIDHEAD_LORE:
Order: Security Robot
Tracking Number: 1138***
Estimated Delivery: 5/14/2056
Shipping Method: Priority / Fragile
Shipping Address: RaCom Robotics, Asimov, Mars
Shipping Details:

This was one of the few complete bits we could salvage from those stolen security robots... That militant group on Pluto had stolen a bunch of those ER-14s, and had been using 'em at their bases for a while. This one specifically, ER-14XPC5VVUFF, lines up with the ones you'd tried to recall a while back. I don't know this history, I just know there was a big bounty for whoever could find the remains for this batch. There's other remnants, too, but they're much less complete... Shouldn't be any danger anymore, at least. Gimme a heads up if you want those shipped your way, too.
strings.SS2_ITEM_ERRATICGADGET_DESC: Your lightning strikes <style=cIsDamage>twice</style>. <style=cIsDamage>{0}%</style> chance on hit to fire <style=cIsDamage>chain lightning</style> for <style=cIsDamage>{1}%</style> TOTAL damage on up to <style=cIsDamage>{2}</style> <style=cStack>(+{2} per stack)</style> targets.
strings.SS2_ITEM_ERRATICGADGET_LORE:
<style=cMono>==========================
======== CallCutter ========
===== ALPHA 0.1354.1.12 =====
==========================

Cutting into call TdiM3c4fcQQA.34074... done
Acquiring audio input from Caller A... done
Caller B........ done
Encrypting line... done
Enable live TTS output?
>Y

==========================
TEXT-TO-SPEECH OUTPUT BELOW
==========================
</style>
Caller A: Hey, do you still have the gadget?
Caller B: Yeah, right here, are we still good to go?
Caller A: Yes, the deal's still on...
Caller A: You haven't told anyone about this, right?
Caller B: What, you think I'm stupid? Of course not!
Caller A: Good. Keep it that way.
Caller B: I will, I will... Say, are you sure this thing's safe to just, like, send through the system?
Caller B: This gadget's some sort of high-end weapon modification, isn't it?
Caller A: Don't sweat it, the gadget's perfectly safe. UES doesn't check their packages. I've used their mailing system loads before, and I'm still doing just fine.
Caller B: Eh, if you say so. I'll send it through, and I'm expecting fifteen-thousand credits within the next twenty-four hours, as planned.
Caller A: As planned. Good doing business with you.

<style=cMono>==========================
=====CALL DISCONNECTED=====
==========================

Severing line..... done
Backing up recording........ done
Save text output?
>Y
strings.SS2_ITEM_GREENCHOCOLATE_DESC: When damaged for at least <style=cIsHealth>{0}%</style> of your max HP, the excess damage is reduced by <style=cIsDamage>{1}%</style>, and also gain a stacking buff that grants <style=cIsDamage>+{4}%</style> base damage and <style=cIsDamage>+{5}%</style> critical chance for <style=cIsDamage>{2}s</style> <style=cStack>(+{3}s per stack)</style>.
strings.SS2_ITEM_GREENCHOCOLATE_PICKUP: Reduce damage taken and gain a huge damage and critical chance bonus upon taking heavy damage.
strings.SS2_ITEM_GREENCHOCOLATE_LORE:
<style=cMono>Audio transcription complete from signal echoes. Assigning generic tokens.</style>

[Hissing, loud clank]

MAN 1: Uh... Hey, weird question?

MAN 2: [Audible sigh] What?

MAN 1: Do you know of any weird, exotic chocolates that are bright green in color?

MAN 2: What? What on Earth are you on about?

MAN 1: I found some green chocolate in this security chest, and I'm asking if that's normal or not.

MAN 2: Uh, no, it's not. I don't think so, anyways. I wouldn't know.

[Crinkling]

MAN 1: So then what's it supposed to be? Do you think this is poisonous, too?

MAN 2: Probably not. And, ugh, for the last time, the meat wasn't poisonous, you've just got a weak stomach.

MAN 1: Alright, I guess I'll keep it, for if things get desperate.

MAN 2: That's probably not a great idea, but alright.

<style=cMono> End of requested transcript.</style>
strings.SS2_ITEM_INSECTICIDE_DESC: <style=cIsDamage>{0}%</style> chance to <style=cIsDamage>poison</style> an enemy for <style=cIsDamage>{1}%</style> <style=cStack>(+{1}% per stack)</style> base damage.
strings.SS2_ITEM_INSECTICIDE_LORE:
Return: REAVE Insect Killer Aerosol 400g (8)
Tracking Number: 3528*******
Estimated Delivery: 1/6/2056
Shipping Method: Standard
Shipping Address: 299 Umbrella Way, Itoki Fluctus, Venus
Reason For Return:

Product arrived damaged. Five cans have noticable physical damage and deformities, two to the point of leakage. One is completely burst. I've seen your commercials and knowing what that stuff's capable of leaves me thinking it'd best be disposed of by your experts, on your dime.

I'll be expecting a refund on this as well.
strings.SS2_ITEM_NKOTASHERITAGE_DESC: Receive <style=cIsUtility>{0}</style> <style=cStack>(+{0} per stack)</style> <style=cIsUtility>items</style> upon level up. Rarity of items increases with level.
strings.SS2_ITEM_NKOTASHERITAGE_PICKUP: Receive an item upon level up.
strings.SS2_ITEM_NKOTASHERITAGE_LORE:
"My friends. I have gathered you all here today to share some important news.

First, it pains my heart to announce that Nkota, the last of our great leaders, our kind matriarch, has sadly passed on from this life. As far as we know, she took her last breath peacefully in rest last night, full of years and with all business here finished. With that said, there shall be no one to succeed her in leadership. She was the last of her line, with no living brothers, sisters, or children.

Instead, in her final testament, her wisdom has created a new beginning. For us. For all of us. Her wish is that the remaining members of this community spread out, either together or separately, into the world. It is perhaps a drastic option, but one that I, personally, also believe to be the best for this community.

Nkota shall be buried at our final destination, as is her will. You all may grieve for her and this community for a time, but do not tarry. A group of pilgrims will travel with myself to the great grey path, fifty miles west, after a week's time. You may follow, or go on your own way. It is your choice entirely. If you do not think that you can make the journey, do not fret. Nkota may have had no children, yes, but her heritage is in spirit, not in blood. You are all her children, and she will protect you until you reach your final goal.

Thank you all for your time. I would suggest you begin to pack your possessions for the journey ahead."

 - Eulogy for Nkota and the Village of Dago
strings.SS2_ITEM_PORTABLEREACTOR_DESC: Gain <style=cIsUtility>full invulnerability</style> and <style=cIsUtility>100% movement speed</style> for the first <style=cIsUtility>{0}s</style> <style=cStack>(+{1}s per stack)</style> of a stage.
strings.SS2_ITEM_PORTABLEREACTOR_PICKUP: Become invincible when entering a stage.
strings.SS2_ITEM_PORTABLEREACTOR_LORE:
Eighty seconds. Damned lizards. They're more cunning than they seemed.

Seventy seconds. She took a moment to breathe. What had once been harsh winds was no still air, contained within the miniature biosphere.

Sixty seconds. She counted her bullets.

Fifty seconds. Two remaining magazines, a box-worth of shells, one grenade - waterlogged, and a duled knife. Not nearly enough.

Forty seconds. She counted their heads.

Thirty seconds. The lizards gave her shield a wide berth. Either they were frightened of this new technology, or... they were waiting her out.

Twenty seconds. She loaded her shotgun.

Ten seconds. The lizards charged - and she hoped she was ready.
strings.SS2_ITEM_SKATEBOARD_DESC: <style=cIsUtility>Sprint</style> in <style=cIsUtility>any direction</style>. Using a <style=cIsUtility>skill</style> grants a buff which provides <style=cIsUtility>+{0}%</style> <style=cStack>(+{1}% per stack)</style> <style=cIsUtility>movement speed</style> for <style=cIsUtility>{4}</style> seconds, up to <style=cIsUtility>{2}</style> stacks.
strings.SS2_ITEM_SKATEBOARD_PICKUP: Sprint in any direction. Using skills makes you move faster.
strings.SS2_ITEM_SKATEBOARD_LORE:
Wheels, rolling against unhewn stone. Unrefined, uncoordinated technique- irresponsible and careless in equal measure.

"You are doing it wrong."

"I am doing this as I please! This is an art, you know, Brother."

"You've failed countless times already."

"We'll see."

Focused eyes, darting as stars reflecting the sky. Lightning flashes against the remote landscape in the distance. Twinkling thunderbolts catching a stray eye. A single lapse of focus, then an impact. A frustrated scoff. Glares, mutual and infuriated, sharp enough to cut through the gap in the air preceding oncoming thunder.

"I'm beginning to have doubts, Brother."

"..well, I've yet to give up! How could I have failed?"

Impact, skidding quick enough to sear against the kicked-up dust. Shaky limbs, rising from the ground. Defiance. Potential energy, mounting into heat and purpose, tangible in the air. Suffocating tension, louder than thunder. It all comes crashing down.

"Another failure."

"..you know, I don't believe I've failed once, Brother. There's something to be said of art about the simple act of learning."

"You HAVE failed! Each and every time you have tried you have failed, and I have attempted to teach you- but you do not listen. I grow tired of teaching and tired of watching!"

Wheels begin to roll against stone again. They hum and kick like an organ attuned to the pulse of the Earth underfoot, barely holding on.

"You incessantly add your own additions to even my simplest instructions.."

Forward movement. The thrill of velocity in one's chest. Of feeling your blood and senses rush back, jostled by inertia. A reminder of truly being alive.

"When you're done playing with all this, allow me to demonstrate what I've tried to teach."

Uncontrollable energy, wild and frenzied- forces converging together at last. A perfect storm.
Rotation, freed of an axis and speed- that essential rush of heat and velocity.
Lightning. Raw energy, full of potential- now fully realized.
Joy and astonishment and elation. Shock. Satisfaction. Excitement. A third voice, calling out impatiently over the Venusian storm.

"Come in, boys- dinner's ready and it's no weather to be skateboarding in!"
strings.SS2_ITEM_BANEFLASK_DESC: Spread debuffs on kill or something also has a debuff owie that hurts
strings.SS2_ITEM_BANEFLASK_PICKUP: Attacks apply bane. Each debuff on Baned enemies increases Bane damage.
